snippet: The move by the Public Ministry is thought to be the first time that former President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva has been directly investigated in connection to the scheme.
abstract: Brazil's Public Ministry, body of independent public prosecutors, has begun investigation into claim connecting former Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva to vast vote-buying scheme that involved channeling of funds to governing Workers' Party.
lead_paragraph: The move by the Public Ministry is thought to be the first time that former President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva has been directly investigated in connection to the scheme.

headline.seo: Brazil Opens Inquiry Into Claims of Wrongdoing by Ex-President
headline.main: Brazil Opens Inquiry Into Claims of Wrongdoing by Ex-President
headline.print_headline: Brazil Opens Inquiry Into Claims of Wrongdoing by Ex-President

keywords.value: Dirceu de Oliveira e Silva, Jose
